openingDate.dldescription: The opening date/time of the reporting period

balancePeriod.dldescription: The duration of a reporting period. For instance, �P1M� is the ISO 8601 short form for one month.

closingDate.dldescription: Opening Date and Closing Date may be specified in place of Opening Date and Transaction Period.

createdDate.dldescription: The date in which the transaction was created, with time-zone information if required. May be used for synchronisation.

updatedDate.dldescription: The date in which the transaction was updated, with time-zone information if required. May be used for synchronisation

accountId.dldescription: Unique identifier of the account in the source system

accountCode.dldescription: Numeric or string account ledge code as defined in the source system for that farm or enterprise

industryAccountCode.dldescription: Industry standard account code (used for benchmarking/reporting). See Appendix A.1 of [Financial standard](https://github.com/Datalinker-Org/Farm-Data-Standards/blob/master/Financial%20Data%20Standard/README.md)

category.dldescription: Optional additional categorisation (source system or agreed between exchanging parties)

netAmount.dldescription: The net amount for the transaction; positive for a debit and negative for a credit

grossAmount.dldescription: The tax inclusive amount (Net Amount + Tax Amount)

priceBasis.dldescription: Describes the pricing basis of the transaction. (See Appendix A.3 of [Financial standard](https://github.com/Datalinker-Org/Farm-Data-Standards/blob/master/Financial%20Data%20Standard/README.md))

quantity.dldescription: Describes the number of units involved in the transaction

unit.dldescription: Describes the unit of measure for the item in the transaction. (See Appendix A.4 of [Financial standard](https://github.com/Datalinker-Org/Farm-Data-Standards/blob/master/Financial%20Data%20Standard/README.md))

netUnitAmount.dldescription: Describes the value of one unit (Net Amount / Quantity)
